abstract: President Trump has sought to distance himself from the two men, Lev Parnas and Igor Fruman, who were involved in the Ukraine pressure campaign.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for Lev Parnas, the former associate of Rudolph W. Giuliani who has offered to testify at the impeachment trial, released a new recording on Thursday of President Trump meeting in April 2018 with a small group of donors at Mar-a-Lago, his private club in Florida.
